member.name: T:MTRenderingChecker
member.summary: Vuforia does not yet support multithreaded rendering on mobile platforms as introduced with Unity 4.3. On previous Unity versions, including 4.2, PlayerSettings.MTRendering would return true even though not available on mobile platforms. This editor class checks for the editor setting and logs an error if it is set.

member.name: T:TrackerEditor
member.summary: Editor of the QCARBehaviour

member.name: M:TrackerEditor.OnInspectorGUI
member.summary: OnInspectorGUI exposes public Tracker settings in Inspector WorldCenterMode: Defines how the relative transformation that is returned by the QCAR Tracker is applied. Either the camera is moved in the scene with respect to a "world center" or all the targets are moved with respect to the camera.

member.name: T:UnityPlayModeEditorUtility
member.summary: This class implements to IPlayModeEditorUtility to provide various editor functionality (popups, reading xml files) at play mode runtime without introducing a depenency on UnityEdtitor from runtime classes.

member.summary: Displays a popup dialog in the Unity editor

member.name: M:UnityPlayModeEditorUtility.LoadAndParseWebcamProfiles(System.String)
member.summary: Loads web cam profiles from an XML file at a given path and returns all of them including the default profile

member.name: M:UnityPlayModeEditorUtility.RestartPlayMode
member.summary: Forces a restart of Play Mode in the Editor. It is called when Unity re-compiles the scripts shortly after starting play mode.
